name: Raindrops Keep Fallin' on My Plants! [Remake]
name_original: Raindrops Keep Fallin' on My Plants! [Remake]
description:
What a better way of growing plants near a river... What's that you're growing cactus!?! AND in a rain storm?!!!
A remake of a game that we'd made during the GBJAM 5 (2016) link here

----

Notes : The PC versions will be updated to add extra modes that are not viable on a small phone screen

----

Developed using Unity3D

Chiptune & SFX Created with : http://www.beepbox.co/

----

Made by Five Leaf Clover Studio (2017)
